Item.name: Reinforced Welding Fuel Tank
Item.aliases: ekutility_heavytank_weldingfuel,heavy fuel tank,heavy welding fuel tank
Item.description: High-pressure composite tank, resistant to puncture and heat.

Item.name: Reinforced Incendium Fuel Tank
Item.aliases: heavy incendium tank,heavy incendium fuel tank
Item.description: High-pressure composite tank, resistant to puncture and heat.

Item.name: Electric Drill
Item.description: Industral strength handheld drill. Used for mining and salvage operations.

Item.name: Metallic Foam Canister
Item.aliases: metal foam canister, metal foam tank, metallic foam tank
Item.description: Contains an advanced metal-catalyst dissolution used to rapidly repair hull damage, for use in the Metallic Foam Sprayer. Danger: Highly toxic.

Item.name: Metallic Foam Sprayer
Item.aliases: metallic foam gun,metal foam sprayer,metal foam gun
Item.description: Advanced hull sealing technology. Utilizes a special chemical-metalloid formula extruded through a heated nozzle to rapidly repair fractured or punctured hull sections.

Item.name: Ion Pulse Cutter
Item.description: Heavy cutting tool which utilizes rapid pulses of accelerated charged particles. Effective against a range of materials but suffers from poor power efficiency.

Item.name: Medical Scanner
Item.description: A handheld scanner that displays the health status of individuals.

Item.name: Gyro-compass
Item.description: Self-illuminating handheld compass.

Item.name: Grappling Hook
Item.description: Have fun swinging through the air without a care in the world.

Item.name: Long Range Radio
Item.description: A waterproof high-power radio transmitter pack designed for use by coalition expedition crew.

Item.name: Sledgehammer
Item.description: Low-tech unwanted structure removal solution.

Item.name: Electro-flare
Item.description: A small self-contained lighting unit. Can be recharged at a charging dock.

Item.name: Status PDA
Item.description: Handheld computer which displays local structural and atmospheric information from the onboard diagnostics network.

Item.name: Hull Patching Kit
Item.description: A low-tech solution for temporary hull repairs. Consumes steel bars to repair structural damage.

Item.name: Laser Bore
Item.aliases: ek laser bore,laser drill,ek laser drill
Item.description: Phase-multiplied portable laser unit designed for cutting away ice and rock. Overheats easily due to its compact design.

Item.name: Mining Backpack
Item.description: A sturdy backpack with external frame, often used by mining outpost crews.

Item.name: Medical Backpack
Item.description: A simple medical bag designed to be worn as a backpack.

Item.name: Arc Welder
Item.description: Electrically powered welding tool which utilizes a heavy electrode to create arcs of plasma.

Item.name: Portable Bilge Pump
Item.description: debug item

Item.name: Incendium Fuel Rod
Item.description: A bar of enriched incendium, for use within a reactor. Generates significantly more heat and lasts longer than uranium fuel rods.
